Convenant glyphs

Please note that these tools aren't optimized for large amounts of data, processing can slow down or run into problems once you reach above 150,000 characters. A cap of 1 million characters is currently in place.

Covenant glyphs

Convert Covenant glyphs from the video game Halo to their text alternative, these glyphs were featured during an episode of the Halo 5: Guardians behind the scenes show "The Sprint". The "Create image" button downloads an image version of the glyphs selected and displayed below the text version.

There is more information available on the Sangheili language Halopedia page.

Covenant glyphs
